text: You can reveal this card in your hand; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand in face-down Defense Position. You cannot Special Summon the turn you activate this effect, except in face-down Defense Position. When your opponent activates a card or effect in response to the activation of your card or effect (Quick Effect): You can change this Set card to face-up Defense Position; return up to 3 cards on the field to the hand. After this card was flipped face-up, while it is in the Monster Zone, each time a card(s) is added to your opponent's hand by their card effect, inflict 900 damage to your opponent for each.
pendulum_text: Each time a monster(s) is flipped face-up, place 1 Sinquisition Counter on this card. At the end of the Battle Phase, if you have an "Enneacraft" card in your other Pendulum Zone: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls with less ATK than this card; destroy it.
